title: I am interested in investing in stocks with 3000 rupees. How do I start investing? - Quora

response.answer_text: Get a demat account fromthe leading brokerage houses or from your bank itself. Start investing in quality mid cap companies. Dont go for penny stocks. Get to know the fundamentals of stock market and start investing. Hope you increase your amount in the next few months. Happy Investing.
With this amount you can start your trading in stock option. As this amount is not enough for the future. Either you can go for Stock Cash or Stock Option that will be best for you.
